verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus,
Holy and Anointed One, Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus,
Risen and Exalted One, Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your name is like honey on my lips,
Your Spirit like water to my soul,
Your word is a lamp unto my feet,
Jesus, I love You, I love You.
